name: Portal Escape (GalaxyVinci05)
description:
An escape room puzzle game inspired by Portal 2, made for Trijam #159! The theme was "Control more than one"

(Work time was about 7 hours, making the portal mechanics was a nightmare)

In this game you're in a sort of escape room, and you control two different cubes that can shoot portals in order to teleport from a place to another. The goal is to make both the cubes reach their respective goals.

Controls:
A and D to move the blue cube and W to jump
Left, right and up arrows for the red cube
Space to shoot a portal from both cubes

Goal:
Make both the cubes stay on their respective goals simultaneously (the goal looks like a darker colored version of the cube)
